username.error: You can only enter 1~32 digit numbers, letters, and underlined user names. Please re-enter them.
username.chinese: There is no Chinese in the username.
username.dupname: The username has already existed, please reenter it.

password.error: You can only enter 8~16 bit password without spaces. Please retype.

confirmPassword.error: The two password is inconsistent. Please confirm that the password has entered an error.

mobile.error: The number of mobile phone number is not correct, please retype.
mobile.exist: The phone number has been used, please change the phone number.
mobile.format: The number of mobile phone number is not correct, please retype
mobile.mutierror: Phone number format is incorrect or has been used. Please re-enter.
